metadata.name: The Dark Man
metadata.description:
September Mourning: Resurrection is a mysterious, intriguing, gamified adventure through the blockchain and lore of September Mourning. This begins as an open edition, with “The Dark Man” and introduces the Reaper Army. 

The Dark Man was crafted by Fate specifically to handle the Reaper Army and the collection of souls. His name is derived from his symbiotic relationship with Dark Matter. The Reapers he controls are composed of Dark Matter.  
Fate, the creator of worlds, built an "internal tracking device" into all Dark Matter, which allows The Dark Man to keep tabs on the Reapers when they are in the world of the living and communicate with them telepathically.

Burning various amounts of The Dark Man unlocks all types of resurrection spells.

Chapter One: Let’s play a game to save your soul…

Welcome to the land of Mortem, another plane of existence where Fate and The Dark Man reign supreme, and their minions, the Reapers, are being resurrected to take your soul. 

Burn The Dark Man to cast the Resurrection spells

1: Redeem for a piece to fight the reapers, exclusive to Resurrection holders on upcoming Manifold drop

3: Resurrect the Reaper: Riven  
As the youngest and least hardened Reaper, Riven devours gentle souls that are often damaged by their harsh life-experiences. He feeds on their discomfort, joy, pain… all their feelings.  
After Resurrection is complete,  download his soundtrack song.

6: Resurrect the Reaper: Shadou  
Where there is no light there are shadows and where there are shadows, the Reaper Shadou is waiting. He feeds on the docile, simple souls that lived their life outside of the spotlight. 
After Resurrection is complete, download his soundtrack song and graphic novel.

16: Resurrect the Reaper: Stitch  
As the master of the time/space continuum, Stitch constantly jumps between different times and planes of existence to collect the most elusive souls. He feeds on souls that may have a sixth sense that their final day is coming, those souls who wish to escape their fate.  
After Resurrection is complete, download his soundtrack song and graphic novel.

26: Resurrect the Reaper: Wraith  
As the strongest, eldest, and most feared of all the Reapers, Wraith rips souls from their bodies with sheer brute force. He feeds on the darkest, most powerful souls in this world...souls that have committed brutal crimes on others and feed on their pain.  
After Resurrection is complete, download his soundtrack song, graphic novel pdf, and signed edition of the physical graphic novel.

166: Resurrect Items from The Book Of Fate

666: Resurrect your Soul

More resurrection spells to come… 
Collect them all to seal your “Fate”
